author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Southern Railway would operate the following special trains between Chennai Egmore and Tirunelveli on special fares to clear the extra rush:

The Chennai Egmore – Tirunelveli Special Train (06183) will leave Chennai Egmore at 9.05 p.m. February 19 and 26 and reach Tirunelveli at 10.45 a.m.the next day. Train No.06184 The Tirunelveli – Chennai Egmore Special (06184) will leave Tirunelveli at 2.45 p.m. on February 28 and reach Chennai Egmore at 4.20 a.m. the next day.

The trains will have one AC 2-tier, two AC 3-tier, 12 sleeper class and two luggage-cum-brake van coaches.

The trains will stop at Tambaram, Chengalpattu, Villupuram, Vridhachalam, Tiruchi, Dindigul, Kodaikanal Road, Madurai, Virudhunagar, Sattur, Kovilpatti and Vanchi Maniyachchi. It will have a stop at Mambalam.

Advance reservation for the above trains are open, a Southern Railway release said.
title: Special trains between Chennai-Tirunelveli
